example.code:
PS C:\>New-IAMLoginProfile -UserName Bob -Password P@ssw0rd -PasswordResetRequired $true
CreateDate PasswordResetRequired UserName ---------- --------------------- -------- 4/14/2015 12:26:30 PM True Bob
example.description: This example creates a (temporary) password for the IAM user named Bob, and sets the flag that requires the user to change the password the next time Bob signs in.
